A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst SW movie yet.  Hint:  Use of Hyperdrives could've made this movie 10 minutes long.  Lazy and thoughtless writing\, HUGE plot holes\, useless plot twists\, useless characters\, tarnishes first trilogy... This movie should be completely re-written and re-made before episode 9 - A fresh start if you will - I would've rated this -5 stars if I could but you have to give it at least 1 star to count.
